main event: A duty officer reported seeing a brilliant white, triangular shaped object that looked like an aircraft in Wilmington, Ohio.
interesting points: The object appeared to be solid and looked like a star, but was much brighter and larger than a star.
The object hovered for about 5 minutes then moved rapidly straight up out of sight.
The object was described as silvery white in color.
The observer compared the size of the object to being about 6 times as large as a star.
sighted object: a brilliant white, triangular shaped object
